column1: 19:34|19:34|I checked my watch at 19:34 and thought that would be unfortunate
column3: if Pepperidge finally called me and heard only the engaged tone while Al was asking about his girlfriend's health or his aunt's or whoever the hell it was on the other end
column4: my chest's easier but there's still this cough
column5: and the doctor says I do not care what the doctor says
column6: just get off the line.|Quiller's Run|Adam Hall
